name: Corner of light
description:
Corner of light is a Dungeon Game where you play as a knight that needs to find his way out of a maze.

Plot: After dying in battle you barely remember the events that happened before you reach this limbo. You start in a dark place with only a candle, and you have to find keys to unlock different rooms and reach the prize at the end of the journey.

Just beware of the traps! or you might fall into oblivion again!

Controls:

WASD or arrows to move around.

Credits: 

2D art:

Matias Aranda

Music and sfx:

Manuel Gago

Programming:

Esteban Nicolás Sonaglioni

Diego Gonzalez

Rodrigo Acevedo

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/corner-light-1
